file_content.text: Lieutenant Orawn reporting in, sir. Our company is on the ground, and we have secured the perimeter.
Lieutenant Orawn reporting in, my lord. Our company is on the ground, and we have secured the perimeter.
Tell me you cut off their retreat.
We cut them off and cut them down. There were a lot of them, but they didn't break through.
Absolutely, my lord. We assessed the situation and countered it. Good to see this place still standing.
We're the Orbital Reserve, sir. We did what we came to do.
You couldn't have arrived while I was fighting an army?
I apologize profusely. We landed as soon as possible, then had to ensure no Talz escaped as we closed in.
I'm sorry, my lord, we were ensuring no Talz escaped the trap.
I'm sorry, sir, we were ensuring no Talz escaped the trap.
We'll finish up here. If you return to Dorn Base, Commander Tritan will no doubt want to congratulate you in person.
